effect.black_white: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.black_2_white_2: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.

short_effect.black_white: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

flavor_text.black_white: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
